annotations:
DENSAY
Shipping and Trading DMCC
chartering@densaydubai.com
// ERCAN
GOOD DAY
HOME  TONNAGE  OPEN   AT   MONTOIR    O/A   31 AUG /  04   SEPT  AGW WP
*GRAIN CLEAN
MV SSI TRIUMPH
61,236 DWT ON 13.01 M
BLT 2014 IMABARI JAPAN
GRT 34,773 / NRT 20,193
LOA 199.99 M / BEAM 32.26 M / TPC 61.40
GRAIN 77,610 CBM / BALE 73,551 CBM
5 HO / 5 HA
CR 4X30 MT (4X24 MT WHEN GRAB USE)
4X12 CBM GRABS
SPEED & CONSUMPTION
LADEN : ABT 11.50 KNOTS ON ABT 19 MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
BALLAST : ABT 12.30 KNOTS ON ABT 19 MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
PORT IDLE : ABT 2.5 MT IFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING : ABT 4.5 MT IFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
SPEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) AND SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENT
AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS LOADED LESS THAN VESSEL'S MAX SUMMER LOADLINE, EVEN KEEL CONDITION AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY, CONGESTED WATERS,
STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF HOT/COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS. IF SEA WATER TEMPERATURE IS BELOW 15 DEGREE CELCIUS THERE WILL BE EXTRA BOILER
CONSUMPTION.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS, FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS, CHARTERERS
MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED
WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER
WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY CALCULATION FOR GOOD WEATHER DAYS SHALL BE ONLY APPLICABLE AND LIMITED FOR THE GOOD WEATHER DAYS ONLY AND CANNOT BE SPREAD ALL OVER THE ENTIRE VOYAGE.
BUNKERING AT OPL NOT ALLOWED
DURING CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, BUNKERS  TO BE SUPPLIED SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH MIN ISO 8217:2017 SPECIFICATION OR ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
-VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
-LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER, CHARTERERS ARE ONLY PERMITTED TO SUPPLY ABOVE GRADES TO THE VESSEL.
VESSEL CAN ONLY BE BUNKERED UP TO 85 PCT OF TANK CAPACITY. COMINGLING OF DIFFERENT BUNKER STEMS NOT ALLOWED.
ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT
Best Regards,
Ercan Kibar
Shipowning Division
Mob: +90 506 980 28 11
Skype:
ercankibar@gmail.com
